subject: Re: Is Junit-based testing REALLY possible for commercial software development ?
msgSnippet: Thanks, Kamal, I think I won t need the list since it may violate privacy. Knowing lots of people are really using JUnit-based tools in commercial software
messageBody:
Thanks, Kamal,

I think I won't need the list since it may violate privacy. Knowing
lots of people are really using JUnit-based tools in commercial
software development is enough to me. :)

Cheers,
- Frank


--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Kamal Ahmed <KAhmed@...> wrote:
>
> Frank,
>
> This is first hand knowledge, I am working for a commercial company,
and we
> ARE using Junit based testing as far as anyone in the company can
remember.
> I know at least 5 companies (I can send you the list OFF this list,
since I
> do not want to violate their privacy) who are using Junit, as well
as have
> implemented Agile Programming Model.
>
> Hope this helps.
> Thanks,
> -Kamal.
